column5: HI,  I am looking to buy daiwa rods like daiwa steez spinning and casting rods, and maybe a cielo.............   Does anybody know of a tackle shop in or around the toronto area that sells or would order these daiwa rods..???  Bass pro does not, JB's does not, le baron used to but not anymore, al flahertys no, tremblays no..........So anybody who knows and could tell me, I would appreciate it  I am also interested in knowing a store which carries a good selection of Loomis rods as well (except bass pro and le baron)  thank you have a good day!
I know you said except Le Baron...  But we're currently offering 20% off all in-stock Loomis rods, FYI.
If your interested in Daiwa rods you should check out the Zillions. Great rods.
Agreed  http://www.tackletour.net/TTForums/viewtop...p;hilit=zillion  Even try the new R-type Rapala rods, I compared them side by side to the Zillions I was impressed.
Bass City H7 & W. Kennedy Daiwa dealer  Buy 7'1'', made in Japan others are not good.
try Angling Specialties at Kennedy and Steeles
